title: brycemcwhirter.com (this website)
description: My web portfolio showcases a collection of my software development projects, built using modern technologies such as Svelte.js for the front-end, Tailwind CSS for styling, and deployed with continuous integration and deployment tools like GitHub Actions and Netlify.

title: UCan.Do.It
description: Created UCAn.Do.It as a class project for my data communications course at Baylor, utilizing TCP and UDP protocols in Java to transmit location records to a server.

title: Food Truck Finder
description: Developed a food truck finder application for a class project in 2021, featuring a React.js front-end and a Java Spring Boot backend, allowing users to easily locate and rate local food trucks
